Michele Tizzoni

Infectious Diseases. Complex Networks. Data Science.

  • New publication

    The paper “The Scaling of Human Contacts and Epidemic Processes in Metapopulation Networks” has been published by Scientific Reports.

    October 19, 2015
    in News

  • CCS 15

    I will be in Tempe, AZ, to attend the Conference of Complex Systems 2015 from September 28 to October 2, and present two talks: "The scaling of human contacts and epidemic processes in metapopulation networks" "Quantifying social contacts in a household setting of rural Kenya using wearable proximity sensors" in...

    September 8, 2015
    in News

  • RAPIDD workshop

    From September 6 to September 9, I will be in Cambridge, UK, to join a RAPIDD workshop on Gravity Models, Disease Spread and Spatial Scales.

    August 25, 2015
    in News

  • New manuscript

    The Scaling of Human Contacts in Reaction-Diffusion Processes on Heterogeneous Metapopulation Networks by Tizzoni M, Sun K, Benusiglio D, Karsai M, Perra N. is available on the Arxiv.

    July 30, 2015
    in News
